medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain with nausea, vomiting, fever, and chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began worsening in the past 24 hours; right lower quadrant pain described for several days. Patient also reports diarrhea, which is non-bloody, but sometimes sees blood on tissue when wiping.
medical_history.social_history: History of alcoholism, now reduced to a couple of beers occasionally, previously drank hard liquor frequently.
